name: Kitty's Mansion
description:
If I tell you "cat's life", what will you answer me? 

Calm,

Very hunting, very siesta,

Or Luxury, calm and voluptuousness...

But I'm pretty sure the words "horror, anguish and bruising" don't come to mind.

However, this is what came out of our fragile minds with this game which features a poor cat as plump as it is irresistible in the eyes of a little girl who is a little too affectionate and possessive.

Your mission: help the cat escape from this danger that stinks of candy!

-----------------------------

Game created in 48 hours during a Game Jam. There were two guys in my team: we are both developers, and I was also in charge of creating all the 3D assets.

The themes were:

-Horror

- But where is this stupid cat?
